43.1.hd_quote: The recognition that new forms cannot be established until resistance has been eliminated.
43.1.behavioral_axis: Knows the insight is real but waits until the field is ready.
43.1.shadow_axis: Impatience to show the insight → sour taste, rejection.

43.2.hd_quote: The maintenance of specialized attitudes which promote breakthrough.
43.2.behavioral_axis: Keeps a precise mental environment so insight can land.
43.2.shadow_axis: Can get rigid or preachy about ‘right’ thinking.

43.3.hd_quote: The powerful drive for regeneration that will, when breakthrough is threatened, use any means.
43.3.behavioral_axis: Fights for the insight when it’s about to be shut down.
43.3.shadow_axis: Overreacts to criticism → abandons insight to stay accepted.

43.4.hd_quote: A stubborn reliance on one's unique insights that demands focused mental ability to be properly conceptualized.
43.4.behavioral_axis: Stays with the odd idea until it can be explained.
43.4.shadow_axis: Can ignore relationships while obsessed with the insight.

43.5.hd_quote: The step by step adaptation to relationships which hinder breakthrough.
43.5.behavioral_axis: Times the insight for maximum group receptivity.
43.5.shadow_axis: Over-harmonizes → insight gets diluted or never shared.

43.6.hd_quote: Unique knowing that is both personally and collectively of value.
43.6.behavioral_axis: Carries the fully formed insight into the new order.
43.6.shadow_axis: Smuggles personal ego patterns into the new order.
